items.title: 1.2 Introduction to ROS2
items.description: Learn about the Robot Operating System version 2, its architecture, and core concepts for robotics development.

items.title: 1.3 ROS2 Core Concepts and Implementation
items.description: Deep dive into ROS2 core concepts with practical implementation details for Physical AI systems.

items.title: 1.4 Gazebo-ROS2 Integration
items.description: Connect ROS2 nodes to Gazebo simulation environment for hardware-in-the-loop testing.

items.title: Module 2 Capstone Project: Complete Simulation Environment
items.description: Integrate all Module 2 concepts into a comprehensive simulation project with robot, sensors, physics, and ROS2 integration.

items.title: Module 2 Quiz: Robot Simulation with Gazebo
items.description: Test your understanding of Gazebo simulation fundamentals, robot integration, physics, and ROS2 integration.

items.title: Module 2, Week 4: ROS2 Integration
items.description: Connecting ROS2 nodes to Gazebo simulation environment for hardware-in-the-loop testing

items.title: Module 2: Robot Simulation with Gazebo
items.description: Learn robot simulation using Gazebo, including model integration, physics simulation, and ROS2 integration

items.title: Week 2 Exercises: ROS2 Introduction and Core Concepts
items.description: Practical exercises to implement and understand ROS2 concepts for Physical AI systems.

items.title: Week 2 Quiz: ROS2 Introduction and Core Concepts
items.description: Test your understanding of ROS2 concepts and implementation for Physical AI systems.

items.title: Week 4 Exercises: Gazebo-ROS2 Integration
items.description: Practical exercises to reinforce understanding of Gazebo-ROS2 integration for hardware-in-the-loop testing.
